code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Fragment as _Fragment,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Banner(){const[movieObj,setMovieObj]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{let apiKey="93adede0a1f1e4785f88203448555798";axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/trending/movie/day?api_key=${apiKey}`).then(function(res){let movies=res.data.results;let randomMovieData=movies[Math.floor(Math.random()*20)];setMovieObj(randomMovieData);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});},[]);if(movieObj.backdrop_path===undefined){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:"...Loading"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" h-[70vh] flex justify-center items-end  bg-cover bg-no-repeat ",style:{backgroundImage:`url(https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original${movieObj.backdrop_path})`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-white py-1 bg-slate-950/50 w-full text-center",children:movieObj.title})})});}
